item.title: Wargames Bandit
item.author: sky_io@outlook.com (Kyle)
item.description: Basic password for user “bandit0” is “bandit0” ssh into the next host, e.g: ssh -p2220 bandit0@bandit.labs.overthewire.org find password for next level goto step 2 Tricks hit <TAB> for command completion ls -a to show hidden files (names started with .) find command man command (man file) Answers level0 (password found: bandit0) level0->level1: cat ./readme (password found: boJ9jbbUNNfktd78OOpsqOltutMc3MY1) level1->level2: cat ./- (password found: CV1DtqXWVFXTvM2F0k09SHz0YwRINYA9) level2->level3: cat .
item.dc:creator: Kyle
